formatted_address: 456 Alexandra Rd, #01-03 Fragrance Empire Building, Singapore 119962
name: Bedz KTV Pub

reviews.text: Excellent and prompt service,  staff were all very friendly ,especially Patrick.. who can sing well! There's also pool table that me and my friends enjoyed too.. Great atmosphere and love their finger foods especially chicken wings, spam fries and Korean fish strips.

Great atmosphere, many tables and chairs, wide range of alcohol bottles.

Comes fitted with many large tv screens for your ktv enjoyments without missing the lyrics whichever direction you turn to.

Staffs are very friendly and accomodating. Kudos to all of them.

They also have a sofa area if you do not prefer the high tables and chairs.

Pool table provided for your entertainment as well. Quality equipments, well-maintained.

Recommended to drop by if you are within the area

Finger food is OK. Service is superb. Atmosphere and karaoke sound system is good.

Quite costly to go frequently on weekends

Very warm pub helmed by Patrick and assisted by Manager Venna. Always feel like going home when I go there. Can literally mix with every table. Sing and drink together. Many good pool player and 歌神歌伍 too.

Went there on a Tuesday night, there was plenty of space for both indoor and outdoor seating. Given the reasonable prices for their food and drinks, this is a great place to unwind after work with colleagues. KTV machines available for guests to use. The boss is extremely friendly and will go from table to table to interact with the guests. The food is standard Singaporean bar food, nothing much to shout about.
